heroSection.title: Find the Ideal Car
heroSection.description: Browse our wide selection of high-quality vehicles and find the perfect car for you.

featuredVehicles.title: Featured Models
featuredVehicles.description: Explore our selection of the latest and greatest vehicles from top brands.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.description: Get in touch with our team to learn more about our vehicles and services.

heroSection.title: Cars for the Discerning Driver
heroSection.description: Explore a wide selection of premium vehicles at our dealership, where quality meets exceptional customer service. Whether you're looking for luxury, performance, or everyday reliability, we are committed to delivering an experience that exceeds expectations.

story.title: Our Journey So Far
story.description: From our humble beginnings, we've grown into a trusted dealership known for offering quality vehicles and exceptional service. Whether you're looking for luxury, performance, or everyday reliability, our focus remains on building trust and providing a seamless car-buying experience. Our passion for driving excellence drives us every day as we help customers find their perfect vehicle.

items.award1: Luxury Car Dealer of the Year (2020-2022)

teamSection.title: Meet Our Team
teamSection.description: Our team of experienced sales and service professionals are dedicated to providing our customers with the highest level of personalized attention and expertise. From our knowledgeable sales staff to our skilled technicians, we are committed to ensuring your experience with us is nothing short of exceptional.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist. Check the URL or go back to the homepage.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.description: Welcome to {companyName}! By accessing and using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read these terms carefully before using our website.

acceptanceOfTerms.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptanceOfTerms.description: By accessing or using our website, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use the website.

websiteUsage.title: Use of the Website
websiteUsage.description: You agree to use the website only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms of Service. You are prohibited from using the website to:

subitems.item2: Engage in any activity that could harm the website's functionality.
subitems.item3: Submit false, misleading, or incomplete information.
subitems.item4: Infringe upon the rights of others, including intellectual property rights.

vehicleListings.title: Vehicle Listings
vehicleListings.description: The information provided on our website, including vehicle listings, specifications, pricing, and availability, is for informational purposes only. While we strive to keep the information accurate and up-to-date, we do not guarantee the accuracy or completeness of any information on the website.

subitems.item1: Vehicle Availability: Vehicle availability is subject to change without notice. Please contact us to verify the availability of any vehicle listed on the website.
subitems.item2: Pricing: Prices listed on the website are subject to change and may not include taxes, fees, or additional costs. We reserve the right to modify prices at any time without prior notice.
subitems.item3: Vehicle Features: Vehicle features and specifications provided on the website are based on available information. We are not responsible for discrepancies between listed features and the actual features of a vehicle.

noGuaranteedTransactions.title: No Guarantee of Sales or Transactions
noGuaranteedTransactions.description: The website is provided as a platform to showcase vehicles. We do not guarantee any sales or transactions through the website. All vehicle purchases must be completed in person at our dealership.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: All content on the website, including text, images, logos, and graphics, is the property of {companyName} or its licensors and is protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You may not copy, distribute, or use any content from the website without our prior written permission.

thirdPartyLinks.title: Third-Party Links
thirdPartyLinks.description: Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services. These links are provided for your convenience, and we do not endorse or assume any responsibility for the content, policies, or practices of third-party websites.

disclaimerOfWarranties.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimerOfWarranties.description: Our website is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not warrant that the website will be error-free, uninterrupted, or secure, or that any information provided is accurate.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.description: In no event shall {companyName}, its officers, employees, or affiliates be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from or in connection with your use of the website or the purchase of any vehicle through our dealership.

changesToTermsOfService.title: Changes to Terms of Service
changesToTermsOfService.description: We reserve the right to update or modify these Terms of Service at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting the updated Terms of Service on our website. It is your responsibility to review the Terms regularly.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.description: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Portugal, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
